title: A Man Who Cooks For Himself And A High School Girl (WN) - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cooking   Cute Story   Heartwarming   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV
author: Akane Jun   茜ジュン
description:
Yuu Yamori, a college student who began cooking for himself six months ago, decides to treat Asahi Mahiru, a high school girl who lives next door, to dinner.

A novice cook and a high school girl just eating together.

How about a laid-back romantic comedy?>
